page.title: 16BRIDGWATER FAIR
page.content: Bridgwater Fair is held at St. Matthews field and goes down West Street to the traffic lights. It is held every year in September. It starts on Wednesday and ends on Saturday evening. On the first morning the Animal Fair for sheep and Quantock ponies is held. The auctioneers go round on the back of a Land Rover looking for farmers' bidding signs. The main attraction of the week is the Fairground. There are rides for young children but most like the cage, Waltzers, Eggs in Space, Rotor and Jungle Ride. On the Waltzers the carts spin in opposite direction to the spinning floor. When you start moving the lights go on and the music blasts out.
